section.title: Configuring OVSvApp Network Resources Using Ansible-Playbook
section.para: The Ardana ansible playbook neutron-create-ovsvapp-resources.yml can be used to create Distributed Virtual Switches and Port Groups on a vCenter cluster.
The playbook requires the following inputs:

listitem.para: vc_net_resources_location This is the path to a file which contains the definition of the resources to be created. The definition is in JSON format.

section.para: In order to execute the playbook from the &clm;, the python-networking-vsphere package must be installed.
The RESOURCE_DEFINITION_FILE is in JSON format and contains the resources to be created.
